ComicInfo.Summary: Dance with the Devil!: LaRoquette heads out to kill Rick Jones but is stopped by Doc Samson. Betty is contacted by her ex-husband. The grey Hulk tricks the new Hulk into following him into an old bunker where he siphons off the gamma radiation and zaps Sam Stearns with it. Rick Jones is freed of the curse of the Hulk and Sam becomes the Leader once again.
